items.title: Photoshop Mobile Coming To Android Today — For Free With All Features
items.description: The smartphone Photoshop app arrived on the iPhone in Feburary, and from today, it lands on Android phones, too.

items.title: George R.R. Martin Is Not Happy With ‘Winds Of Winter’ Fans, Not Happy At All
items.description: The 'Game Of Thrones' author vented about his readers in a weirdly hostile new blog post.

items.title: Nothing Phone (3) Release Date: iPhone Challenger Confirms New Flagship Coming Soon
items.description: The next big release from Nothing is confirmed as the Nothing Phone (3) and is just weeks away. A new tease hints at a different design.

items.title: AI Layoffs And The Human Cost: Can Compassionate Innovation Prevent A Cold Tech Future?
items.description: Organizations would do well to adopt approaches that seek to balance technological competitiveness with humanitarian concern.
